item.title: Need help placing my shop
item.dc:creator: @dimebagx dimebagx
item.description:
@dimebagx wrote:

I used the program called shop maker. im new to this but i have experience in this sort of stuff.
It came out with the code:

[code][Add under the ‘}’ after ‘WanneShop = 2;’ in client.java]
else if (NPCID == 520) {
PutNPCCords = true;
WanneShop = 30;
}

[Add in shops.cfg]
30 Bob_Hollinshead 1 1 1043 20000000

[Add in autospawn.cfg]
520 2690 3485 0 0 0 0 0 1 Michaels_Store[/code]

I got the 2 bottom ones in but I can’t find client.java (as it says in the first thing I must to) Could someone please explain where I add this thankyou.

Read full topic
